trans-unit.source: Plays a media file.
If the media is a video file, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" /> draws it to the specified rectangle.

Although you can declare an instance of this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot load and play its media without using code, because of the dependency on the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> class and in particular the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene sia possibile dichiarare un'istanza di questa classe nella [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], non è possibile caricare e riprodurre i file multimediali senza usare codice, a causa della dipendenza sul <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> classe e in particolare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: To play media in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] only, use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: Per riprodurre file multimediali in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] solo, utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.

trans-unit.source: Despite its name, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> can be used to play audio.
trans-unit.target: Nonostante il nome, un <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> può essere utilizzato per riprodurre l'audio.

trans-unit.source: **Performance Note:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> provides fewer features then an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> does not support layout, input, or focus.
trans-unit.target: **Nota sulle prestazioni:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> fornisce meno funzionalità una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> non supporta i layout, input o lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: However, because it does not support these features, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> provides performance benefits making them ideal for describing backgrounds, clip art, and for low-level drawing with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, poiché non supporta queste funzionalità, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> offre i vantaggi di prestazioni sono ideali per descrivere sfondi, ClipArt e per il disegno di basso livello con <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: See [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [panoramica sugli oggetti disegno](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> è un tipo di <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> dell'oggetto e pertanto può essere bloccato per migliorare le prestazioni.

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> funzionalità, ad esempio il blocco e la clonazione, vedere il [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the VideoDrawing class.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the media player associated with the drawing.
The media player associated with the drawing.
trans-unit.target: Lettore multimediale associato al disegno.
